report.title: Load attribute sets
report.description: List attribute sets along with attribute_sets_surveys ids for use on the Character Canagement Form Existing Attribute Sets drop-down.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM attribute_sets a_set JOIN attribute_sets_surveys ass on ass.attribute_set_id = a_set.id AND ass.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ass.deleted=false WHERE a_set.website_id = #website_id# AND a_set.deleted=false

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Survey ID for report to run against

param.name: website_id
param.description: Website for report to run against
